nodes.text: Jella was a female Human who lived during the waning years of the Republic Classic era.

Jella worked as a member of a crew of a shuttle. In 31 BBY, the craft was rented by tourists in the Cularin system, and Jella helped to fly them from the city Tolea Biqua on the planet Genarius to the moon Uffel. She spent the journey aboard the shuttle's flight deck, along with her fellow crew member, Roya.
